channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ Master
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ Master

item.title: CVE-2022-27677|2024-08-03T05:32:59.928Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%20master
item.description: Failure to validate privileges during installation of AMD Ryzen™ Master may allow an attacker with low privileges to modify files potentially leading to privilege escalation and code execution by the lower privileged user.
